```{r setup}
library(mapselector)

data(regions_simplified_Ouranos)


downloaded_sites <- rcoleo::download_sites_sf()

# add a display name column

downloaded_sites_names <- tableauexplosites:::add_site_name_df(downloaded_sites)

library(sf)


# need to set the crs for downloaded sites
st_crs(downloaded_sites) <- st_crs(regions_simplified_Ouranos)
joined_sites_our <- st_join(downloaded_sites, regions_simplified_Ouranos)


joined_nice_names <- tableauexplosites:::add_site_name_df(joined_sites_our)

tableauexplosites:::make_lookup_vector(joined_nice_names, value_col = "Region", name_col = "display_name")
```
